author: pieterdavid
body:
First part of the changes discussed in https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/CMS/SiStrip_edmServicesToESProducersPopConSourceHandlers
Also updated configs using these sources/producers, and moved the `subDetAndLayer` helper method to `TrackerTopology` (as suggested by Gaelle)
title: CalibTracker/SiStripESProducers edm::Service to ESProducer migration
